Chap. 6 - Letter 43

PREVIEW
     ELLEN WHITE ONCE WROTE, “A SULLEN SUBMISSION TO THE WILL OF THE FATHER WILL DEVELOP THE CHARACTER OF A REBEL.”—“THAT I MAY KNOW HIM,” P. 120. IN WRITING THIS, GOD'S SERVANT ANTICIPATED THE NUMBER ONE PROBLEM CONFRONTING EDUCATORS AND PARENTS: HOW TO CREATE A POSITIVE ATTITUDE ON THE PART OF CHILDREN TOWARD THE CHURCH. THIS IS THE SUBJECT IN THE FOLLOWING LETTER.
